PAD_ApproachingPrisoners.synopsis: Quick VB about the prisoners and the fate that awaits them. This is mainly used to draw attention to them as the players explore the prison area.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Prisoners. I doubt they'll last long in here.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Careful. One wrong move and we'll be behind bars with them.

AD_FlirtyTiefling.synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.

nodes.speaker: Lakrissa
nodes.text: Go, go!
nodes.context: NodeContext: leaving without the player, broken hearted and filled with regret

AD_TieflingsFreed.synopsis: Wulbren has just bust down the back wall of a prison to very surprised tieflings, who he barks this out at.

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Follow or die, tieflings!
nodes.context: NodeContext: yelling with authority and confidence

AD_TieflingInspection.synopsis: Warden has an exchange with the tieflings in Jail.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: Few survive Disciple Balthazar's experiments. This is your chance to submit to the Absolute - to find peace.
nodes.context: NodeContext: this is, in a strange way, the warden trying to be comforting, even if it comes across cruel

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: Leave me alone. Please.
nodes.context: NodeContext: tried of being afraid

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: I am far gentler than Disciple Balthazar. You wish to live? Grow a spine.
nodes.context: NodeContext: rubbing salt in the wound

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: Or, if you're very lucky, perhaps he will split you open and sew in a new one.
nodes.context: NodeContext: a venemous smile at her cruel words

AD_GnomesInJail.synopsis: The gnomes are in jail and discussing their predicament. Wulbren is taking charge and nickles and nimble are doing their best to help.

nodes.speaker: Nimble
nodes.text: We should leave - and soon.
nodes.context: NodeContext: scared and a little frantic

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: That is the plan, Nickels.
nodes.context: NodeContext: sarcasm and condescending

nodes.speaker: Nickels
nodes.text: There's something evil here. Below, down, down... argh!
nodes.context: NodeContext: scared and panicked, noise of pain at 'argh'. Clutches head briefly

nodes.speaker: Nimble
nodes.text: Breathe - I've got you.
nodes.context: NodeContext: comforting her friend

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Unless this 'evil' can get us out of here, I don't want to hear about it.
nodes.context: NodeContext: doesn't really give a shit his comrade is scrared - focused on himself and the plan

ProdigyBrother.synopsis: Cal is the brother of Lia and Rolan. He was ambushed along with the other tieflings and taken to Moonrise. His brother Rolan is at Last light inn. He is afraid but trying to be strong for the other tieflings, and is determined to save his sister.

nodes.speaker: Cal
nodes.text: Don't talk to us. You're just making it worse.
nodes.context: NodeContext: player has refused to help you - furious

AD_ProdigiesInJail.synopsis: AD between Cal and Lia in Moonris prison. They are exhausted and being held by murderous cultists of the Absolute.

nodes.speaker: Cal
nodes.text: I can't believe Rolan is gone. Gods, just saying it out loud...
nodes.context: NodeContext: frantic, looking through the bars, panicked

nodes.speaker: Lia
nodes.text: Let's focus on escaping, all right?
nodes.context: NodeContext: gently practical

nodes.speaker: Lia
nodes.text: We'll give Rolan the send off he deserves - when we're both safe.
nodes.context: NodeContext: gently practical

nodes.speaker: Cal
nodes.text: You're right. Let's... let's talk about something else.
nodes.context: NodeContext: heartbroken, but knows lia is right

AD_WardenInspection.synopsis: Warden heard the gnomes are up to no good and goes verify by herself. The warden stands outside their cell and essentially taunts them - she thinks they are worthless and will die in the cell.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: All comfortable, I hope?
nodes.context: NodeContext: smirking as she speaks to her prisoners - cruel

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Delightful accommodation. You spoil us, Warden.
nodes.context: NodeContext: sarcasm - knows he shouldn't sass the warden but can't help himself

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: Keep that wit - you'll need it, little Wulbren.
nodes.context: NodeContext: taunting a prisoner with a cold, cruel smile

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: The hells you call me?
nodes.context: NodeContext: losing his temper at the warden

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: There it is. You act bold, but there is a weak, temperamental child beneath the mask. I see it. I see you.
nodes.context: NodeContext: satisfied grin as she taunts a prisoner with a cold, cruel smile

AD_ToolRefused.synopsis: Wulbren has asked the player to get 'tools'. Player has to throw the tool to him in the cell. In this instance, player has thrown something to him he can't use.

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Gaerdal help me - how about a club? A hammer? Hurry!
nodes.context: NodeContext: on the brink of losing his temper, trying to sound authorative but he really just wants to call the player an idiot

AD_WaitingForGnomes.synopsis: Tieflings will wait for the gnomes to rescue them if the gnome have tools and their back wall is broken down whilst the tieflings are still in their cells.Their out of combat behaviour has them huddle close to their own wall, hoping for rescue.If combat starts, they give in and start smacking the wall as well.

nodes.speaker: Lakrissa
nodes.text: Shh. Not a word - the gnomes are on their way.
nodes.context: NodeContext: Quiet, hushed, determined (about to escape the prison)

Guard_004.synopsis: Nadi doesn't enjoy being a prison guard but considers it her duty. She tries to reassure the player.

nodes.speaker: Zealot Nadi
nodes.text: Don't speak to the prisoners. The Absolute forbids it.

GnomePrisoner_002.synopsis: Nickles is a savant who has an incredible ability to read the earth and stone around him, but is nervous and quite fearful as a person. He is easily frightened. He is imprisoned in moonrise and in the following lines escapes by boat (which he hates)/fights his way out/ and has a general greeting.

nodes.speaker: Nickels
nodes.text: Nimble said to close my eyes. But I can hear it - the stone is screaming.
nodes.context: NodeContext: terrified

Boat.synopsis: After Wulbren instigates the escape any escaping prisoners try to make it to the boat and flee Moonrise. This dialogue covers the case in which the boat leaves without the player or joins them in the escape.

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Boat's good to go - all that's left is to ship off.
nodes.context: NodeContext: tense but relieved - they've made it to the boat and are about to flee moonrise

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: My plan, for now, is to hide out on the water. Unless you have a better idea?

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: If I were you, I'd stay on the water. But it's your call.

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: True - anywhere is better than here.
nodes.context: NodeContext: worried but trying to be confident

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: But I can't leave without saying this - something big is going on in Moonrise. I heard whispers of something - an army. Do what you have to here, and then leave. Soon.
nodes.context: NodeContext: worried for player

Lover.synopsis: Danis is a tiefling from the grove who is being held prisoner in Moonrise towers. In his initial dialogue he terrified and frantic and worried about his partner Bex (who the player may have met in last light inn). He is also a back up to get the escape quest if Lia and Lakrissa (two other tieflings) are dead.

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: Hey! You were in the grove, right?
nodes.context: NodeContext: Panicked, frantic - speaking through prison bars

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: I was.

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: Please - have you seen Bex? Dark hair, golden eyes - is she in another cell? Is she all right?
nodes.context: NodeContext: bex is the love of your life - terrified she's hurt or worse

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Who?

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: Bex. She was with me in the grove. If she's not here then the curse...
nodes.context: NodeContext: frantic - horror dawning on him

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: Oh gods, Bex.
nodes.context: NodeContext: realising bex is dead

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: I'm sorry, Bex. I'm so sorry.
nodes.context: NodeContext: grieving, breaking down

AD_ProdigySister.synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers. This is a high stress and tense situation as this character tries to flee murderous cultists.

nodes.speaker: Lia
nodes.text: Let's not push our luck any further - we should move.
nodes.context: NodeContext: tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

AD_WardenChase.synopsis: Warden runs out of her post to go after the prisoners.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: The prisoners are escaping! All arms to me - NOW.
nodes.context: NodeContext: Roaring with authority and fury

Wulbren.synopsis: Wulbren is the leader of the Ironhand Gnomes. He is currently imprisoned in moonrise towers. He has the lazy charm of arrogant and the determination and cunning of the leader of a revolution. In this dialogue he offers you the main quest - to free him and the tieflings from the prison. He can speak to you through the bars - either with the player in prison, OR with the player speaking to them from the outside. NOTE: Wulbren pushes hard to charm the player and make them think they're friends. He keeps the friendly and charming mask on tight (dropping it only when he insults the player). We can have the lightest touch of menace in this dialogue, a hint that he's holding something back or that there is more to this than it seems, but it should be a light touch. He is friendly and charming here (the mask will drop back at Haven when he is rescued).

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Nimble! Check for gaps, cracks - anything to leverage the rock.
nodes.context: CinematicNodeContext: Back to the player, speaking to the gnomesNodeContext: determined and confident - used to giving orders and having them followed a she plans his escape

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Nickels: tools - get creative. This rock is basalt - it'll crack with enough pressure.
nodes.context: NodeContext: determined and confident - used to giving orders and having them followed a she plans his escape

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Ah! Don't mind us, True Soul. The back wall is weak - we're working to brace it.
nodes.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turns and sees the player. Surpise Ah! And then rallies himself, trying to turn the situation to his advantageNodeContext: Surprise on Ah! sees player, assumes they are the bad guy. Confidently rallies himself and tries to turn the situation to his advantage.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: You're clearly planning an escape.

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: I wouldn't be so foolish as to think I could escape the Absolute.
nodes.context: NodeContext: player says he's planning an escape. He casually denies it but is also trying to probe the player

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: The Warden has eyes everywhere. And ears.
nodes.context: NodeContext: trying to see who's side the player is on

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: What if I were here to help you escape?

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Huh. And why would you be so inclined?
nodes.context: NodeContext: A beat - wulbren is suspicious of the player but part of him wants to believe the player

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: I'm an undercover agent for the Flaming Fist.
False

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: And I'm a damn hollyphant.
nodes.context: NodeContext: player has tried to persuade you - you don't believe them

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Run along, True Soul.
nodes.context: NodeContext: dismissive - done with the convo and not impressed with the player

Warden.synopsis: The Warden is a devout follower of the Absolute with an iron will, but also a sense of mischief. When the player approaches, she sees it as an opportunity to play with the player a little bit - like a cat with a mouse.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: You spark of the familiar. Do I know you, True Soul?
nodes.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking over the player with a curious glance

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: Hm. Perhaps not - your face is rather bland.
nodes.context: NodeContext: not impressed

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: Whatever your business, a warning: none may speak to the prisoners - Disciple Balthazar was most clear.
nodes.context: NodeContext: Dismissive expecting the player to leave now

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: The rules don't apply to me.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: Is that so? If you are above the General's chief advisor, you must be most impressive.
nodes.context: NodeContext: Toying with the player, a little smirk - she thinks the player is an idiot.

nodes.text: True

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: *Her smirk hides her intent - she's toying with you.*

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: I'm actually Balthazar's closest confidante.
True

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: I didn't know he had such... refined taste.
nodes.context: NodeContext: Looking at player - sarcasm. She's completely unimpressed with them.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: I'm not sure why someone of your stature must converse with prisoners. Perhaps a small donation would convince me.
nodes.context: NodeContext: playful smirk - you're actually planning to rob the player. Pause on 'convince' as she smiles

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Not a chance.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: Pity - I was about to grant you an exception.
nodes.context: NodeContext: she absolutely wasn't

AD_ProdigyBrother.synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.

nodes.speaker: Cal
nodes.text: I can't stand this place. What's the hold up?
nodes.context: NodeContext: quiet and tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

AD_Gnome01.synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.

nodes.speaker: Nimble
nodes.text: Damn it all - let's go!
nodes.context: NodeContext: leaving the player behind to die as she hops on the boat and leaves

AD_WardenInCombat.synopsis: Gnomes and tieflings are escaping, but the guards have spotted them and begun combat. These are the warden's lines. She is a powerful and formidable opponent, and is furious with her prisoners for defying her.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: Run. Beg. It matters not - this ends now.
nodes.context: NodeContext: in a fight - absolutely furious with her opponents.

AD_WardenSpottedMissingPrisoners.synopsis: Plays when she spots no prisoners in the cell.

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: What? Where are the prisoners?
nodes.context: NodeContext: frantic, looking through the bars, panicked

nodes.speaker: The Warden
nodes.text: I'll be flayed alive for this.
nodes.context: NodeContext: the usually intimidating warden is terrified for herself - knows her fate for letting the prisoners escpae

Guard_002.synopsis: Keris is an upbeat and devout follower of the Absolute and admires the Warden.

nodes.speaker: Adept Keris
nodes.text: Did you request this post too? I'm glad I got the Warden and not Z'rell.

nodes.speaker: Adept Keris
nodes.text: Don't get chatty with the prisoners, mind you. The Warden won't like that.

AD_TieflingLover.synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.

nodes.speaker: Danis
nodes.text: We don't have time. Get to the boat, or we leave!
nodes.context: NodeContext: calling out to the player, who is in combat. Wants to leave on the boat and now

AD_Gnome02.synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.

nodes.speaker: Nickels
nodes.text: Flimsy wood. Is it safe? Can it hold us?
nodes.context: NodeContext: tense and nervous - waiting by the boat (it's briefly safe) to leave

AD_Wulbren.synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Blasted chains - keep the bastards off me!
nodes.context: NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

GnomePrisoner_001.synopsis: Nimble is a devout and loyal follower of Wulbren (and a bit of a lickarse). He's dedicated to the ironhand gnomes but does not give a crap about anyone else. He is imprisoned in moonrise towers in these lines/fighting his way out/fleeing by boat.

nodes.speaker: Nimble
nodes.text: Wulbren is the one you want, not I.
nodes.context: NodeContext: dedicated and servile

AD_GoToTieflings.synopsis: Wulbren on the way to free the tieflings.

nodes.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
nodes.text: Break the wall and go - if the tieflings can't keep up, it's their problem.
nodes.context: NodeContext: running through the prison, brisk tone, he's annoyed he has to free the tieflings
